title: rqti 1.0.0
text: Major API Refactor: API functionality refactored require creating Opal object establishing connection. Methods now called object interacting LMS API, replacing previous function-based approach. Added verify_qti() function validate XML documents QTI v2.1 schema. Two schema versions supported: original IMS Global schema extended version permits additional HTML tags. Added new constructor functions assessmentTest(), assessmentTestOpal(), assessmentSection(). default values “academic_grading” parameter/slot updated functions assessmentTest(), assessmentTestOpal(), test(), classes AssessmentTest AssessmentTestOpal. parameter/slot named numeric vector defines grade table shown candidates feedback end test. updated default follows German grading system: gt <- c(“1.0” = 0.95, “1.3” = 0.9, “1.7” = 0.85, “2.0” = 0.8, “2.3” = 0.75, “2.7” = 0.7, “3.0” = 0.65, “3.3” = 0.6, “3.7” = 0.55, “4.0” = 0.5, “5.0” = 0), grade corresponds minimum percentage score required achieve . disable grading table end test, set parameter NA_real_. Generic functions now exported allow advanced users extend functionality S4 classes (createItemBody(), createResponseDeclaration(), createOutcomeDeclaration(), createResponseProcessing(), createText()). Added support preview_feedback option within ‘params’ YAML section R Markdown files. Renamed service name keyring system credential storage “rqtiopal”. Renamed “contributor” slot QtiContributor ‘name’.
